#summary Rating Database SQL Script

= Introduction =

This file has sample queries to view bookmark_rating database.

= Details =

Query to create bookmark_rating table:
CREATE TABLE gnizr_db.bookmark_rating(id INT(10) unsigned NOT NULL,category VARCHAR(100),rating INT, Foreign Key (id) references gnizr_db.bookmark(id),UNIQUE key combo (id,category))ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

Query to drop table:
drop table gnizr_db.bookmark_rating;

sample insert queries:
INSERT INTO gnizr_db.bookmark_rating (id, category,rating) VALUES('1', 'technology', '2' );
INSERT INTO gnizr_db.bookmark_rating (id, category,rating) VALUES('2', 'sports', '2' );
INSERT INTO gnizr_db.bookmark_rating (id, category,rating) VALUES('3', 'music', '2' );

INSERT INTO gnizr_db.bookmark_rating (id, category,rating) VALUES('1', 'technology', '2' ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rating=2


sample select query:
select * from gnizr_db.bookmark_rating;
select rating from gnizr_db.bookmark_rating where id =1 and category = 'technology';
select rating from gnizr_db.bookmark_rating where id =1 and category = 'technology';

sample delete query:
delete from gnizr_db.bookmark_rating where id =1;
